Global on_fork_error

boost::process::extend::on_fork_error — This handler is invoked if the fork failed. The required signature is void(auto & exec), where Exec is a template parameter.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/process/extend.hpp>

unspecified on_fork_error;

Description

Note

Only available on posix.
